sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_62500_mealplan_recipe"> <x_62500_mealplan_recipe action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <cook_time>1970-01-01 00:30:00</cook_time> <cooking_instructions>1. Rinse red lentils and soak in water for 30. 2. Heat olive oil in a pressure cooker over medium heat. 3. Add cumin seeds and cook until they start to splutter. 4. Add chopped onion, minced garlic, minced ginger, and chopped green chili. Cook until onions are translucent. 5. Stir in chopped tomato and cook until soft. 6. Add soaked red lentils, turmeric powder, salt, and pepper. Mix well. 7. Add 2 cups of water and pressure cook for 3-4 whistles. 8. Allow the pressure to release naturally. 9. Garnish with fresh coriander and serve hot with rice or roti.</cooking_instructions> <cuisine display_value="Indian">8f495a179791021069a3b6fce053afcf</cuisine> <diet>42c1c6979711021069a3b6fce053af94</diet> <effort display_value="Easy">fae0a76e9730021069a3b6fce053af3e</effort> <image/> <ingredients/> <meal_type display_value="Dinner">ca8516df9751021069a3b6fce053afdf</meal_type> <name>Masoor Dal</name> <nutrition>Calories: 250, Protein: 15g, Fat: 10g, Carbs: 30g</nutrition> <owned_by display_value="MP Admin">cbb877e697b0021069a3b6fce053af41</owned_by> <pre_cook>false</pre_cook> <prep_instructions>1. Rinse and soak red lentils. 2. Chop onion, tomato, garlic, ginger, and green chili.</prep_instructions> <prep_required>false</prep_required> <prep_time>1970-01-01 00:30:00</prep_time> <serving>2</serving> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-04-07 01:56:01</sys_created_on> <sys_id>4e5917d797d5021069a3b6fce053afd7</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-05-01 06:39:10</sys_updated_on> <time_of_day/> </x_62500_mealplan_recipe> </record_update>
